Class ScoredIdBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.ScoredIdBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<ScoredId>

    public class ScoredIdBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<ScoredId>
    Use a ScoredId.Builder to instantiate new ScoredId objects.
    Since:
    1.1

    Compatibility: Public

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScoredIdBuilder

        public ScoredIdBuilder()
        Create a ScoredIdBuilder. Any ScoredId objects created by this builder will have the default ID of 0 and default score of 0 unless they are explicitly set by the user.

      • ScoredIdBuilder

        public ScoredIdBuilder(long id)
        Create a ScoredIdBuilder. Any ScoredId objects created by this builder will have the specified ID and a default score of 0 unless they are explicitly changed by the user.
        Parameters:
        id - The numerical ID of ScoredId objects produced by this builder.

      • ScoredIdBuilder

        public ScoredIdBuilder(long id,
               double score)
        Create a ScoredIdBuilder. Any ScoredId objects created by this builder will have the specified ID and score unless they are explicitly changed by the user.
        Parameters:
        id - The numerical ID of ScoredId objects produced by this builder.
        score - The score for ScoredId objects produced by this builder.
